description: David Pond is an astrologer, author, speaker, and international workshop leader. He is the author of books on metaphysical topics, including Chakras for Beginners. David has a master of science degree in experimental metaphysics and has been practicing astrology for over thirty-five years. David can be found online at his website: DavidPond.com.
name: David Pond
